verses.roman:
gaṅgā-pathe mahāprabhure naukāte vasāñā
prayāge āilā bhaṭṭa gosāñire lañā

synonyms: gaṅgā-pathe—on the Ganges; mahāprabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; naukāte vasāñā—making to sit down on the boat; prayāge āilā—went to Prayāga; bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; gosāñire lañā—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya avoided the River Yamunā. Putting the Lord on a boat in the River Ganges, he went with Him to Prayāga.
